column4: Can anyone help me with my Feisty Fawn freezing issue? I'm quite new to Linux. Problem as per http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=432186&page=2
there's a sata / ata conflict in Feisty which causes hard disk to freeze for 2 mins at a time. That fixed it for me.
Might not be the same prob. with you, but worth a try
